fields.body:
{% extends 'rah/base_email.html' %} {% block email_content %}

Hi {{ recipient.first_name }},

I’m Shira, the Field Director for Repower at Home. My job is to bring the enthusiasm for saving energy that you find on repowerathome.com into the real world by working with leaders like you.

I see you recently created a team on repowerathome.com, {{ content_object}}. Nice! Teams are a great way for a community to share ideas, compete with friends and work together to save energy.

As the team administrator, you can invite people to your team, moderate discussions and more by using the tools on your team’s page. Get started by inviting some friends to join your team. Try it out now.

Repower at Home teams often work to organize events in their communities, like energy meetings and challenges to recruit Trendsetters. The Repower at Home field team can tell you more about these opportunities. To get in touch, drop us a line at field@repowerathome.com. We’d love to hear your ideas for getting others energized about saving energy.

Happy energy savings,
Shira Miller
Field Director, Repower at Home

{% endblock %}
fields.name: You've created a team
fields.subject: Organizing your Repower at Home team
